00025 class float4x4
00026 {
00027 public:
00028     enum
00029     { 
00031         ROWS    = 4, 
00033         COLUMNS = 4, 
00034     };
00035 
00036 #ifdef _DEBUG
00037 
00038     float4x4()                                                                      {float v = getNaN(); for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) m[i][j] = v;}
00039 #else
00040     float4x4()                                                                      {}
00041 #endif
00042         
00044     float4x4( const float4& x0, const float4& y0, 
00045         const float4& z0, const float4& w0 )                                        {setColumn(0,x0); setColumn(1,y0); setColumn(2,z0); setColumn(3,w0);}
00046 
00048     float4x4( const float3x4& other );
00049 
00051     explicit float4x4( float diagonal );
00052 
00054     float4x4( const float3x3& rotation, const float3& translation );
00055         
00057     float4x4&       operator+=( const float4x4& other )                         {for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) m[i][j] += other.m[i][j]; return *this;}
00058     
00060     float4x4&       operator-=( const float4x4& other )                         {for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) m[i][j] -= other.m[i][j]; return *this;}
00061     
00063     float4x4&       operator*=( const float4x4& other )                         {return *this = *this * other;}
00064     
00066     float4x4&       operator*=( float s )                                           {for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) m[i][j] *= s; return *this;}
00067 
00069     float&          operator()( int row, int column )                               {return m[row][column];}
00070     
00072     void            set( int row, int column, float value )                         {m[row][column]=value;}
00073 
00075     void            setColumn( int i, const float4& c )                         {m[0][i]=c[0]; m[1][i]=c[1]; m[2][i]=c[2]; m[3][i]=c[3];}
00076 
00078     void            setRow( int i, const float4& c )                                {m[i][0]=c[0]; m[i][1]=c[1]; m[i][2]=c[2]; m[i][3]=c[3];}
00079 
00081     void            setRotation( const float3x3& rot );
00082 
00088     void            setRotation( const NS(math,float3)& axis, float angle );
00089         
00091     void            setTranslation( const float3& t );
00092 
00097     void            setInverseOrthonormalTransform( const float3x3& rot, const float3& t );
00098 
00107     void            setPerspectiveProjection( float fovHorz, float front, float back, float aspect );
00108 
00120     void            setScreenTransform( float screenz, float scalex, float scaley, 
00121                         float zmin, float zmax, float cx, float cy );
00122 
00131     void            setPointPlaneProjection( const float3& l,
00132                         const float3& n, const float3& p );
00133 
00142     void            setDirectPlaneProjection( const float3& l,
00143                         const float3& n, const float3& p );
00144 
00146     float4x4        operator+( const float4x4& other ) const                        {float4x4 a; for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) a.m[i][j] = m[i][j] + other.m[i][j]; return a;}
00147     
00149     float4x4        operator-( const float4x4& other ) const                        {float4x4 a; for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) a.m[i][j] = m[i][j] - other.m[i][j]; return a;}
00150 
00152     float4x4        operator-() const                                               {float4x4 a; for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) a.m[i][j] = -m[i][j]; return a;}
00153     
00155     float4x4        operator*( float s ) const                                      {float4x4 a; for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) a.m[i][j] = m[i][j] * s; return a;}
00156     
00158     float4x4        operator*( const float4x4& other ) const;
00159 
00161     float4x4        operator*( const float3x4& other ) const;
00162 
00163     /* Matrix multiplication with 4-vector as 1-column matrix.*/
00164     float4          operator*( const float4& v ) const;
00165 
00167     bool            operator==( const float4x4& other ) const                       {for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) if ( m[i][j] != other.m[i][j] ) return false; return true;}
00168     
00170     bool            operator!=( const float4x4& other ) const                       {for ( int i = 0 ; i < ROWS ; ++i ) for ( int j = 0 ; j < COLUMNS ; ++j ) if ( m[i][j] != other.m[i][j] ) return true; return false;}
00171 
00173     const float&    operator()( int row, int column ) const                         {return m[row][column];}
00174 
00176     float           get( int row, int column ) const                                {return m[row][column];}
00177 
00179     float4          getColumn( int i ) const                                        {float4 d; d[0]=m[0][i]; d[1]=m[1][i]; d[2]=m[2][i]; d[3]=m[3][i]; return d;}
00180 
00182     const float4&   getRow( int i ) const                                           {return *reinterpret_cast<const float4*>(m[i]);} //{float4 d; d[0]=m[i][0]; d[1]=m[i][1]; d[2]=m[i][2]; d[3]=m[i][3]; return d;}
00183 
00185     float3x3        rotation() const;
00186 
00188     float3          translation() const;
00189 
00191     float4x4        transpose() const;
00192 
00194     float           determinant() const;
00195 
00197     float4x4        inverse() const;
00198 
00200     float3          transform( const float3& v ) const;
00201 
00203     float4          transform( const float4& v ) const;
00204 
00206     void            transform( const float3& v, float3* v1 ) const;
00207 
00209     void            transform( const float4& v, float4* v1 ) const;
00210 
00212     float3          rotate( const float3& v ) const;
00213 
00215     void            rotate( const float3& v, float3* v1 ) const;
00216 
00218     bool            finite() const;
00219 
00220 private:
00221     float           m[ROWS][COLUMNS] MATH_ALIGN_128;
00222 };
